creator: Emma Goldman; Alexander Berkman
description:
LibriVox recording of Deportation: Its Meaning and Menace. Last Message to the People of America by Emma Goldman; Alexander Berkman.
Read in English by Krzysztof Rowiński; KHand
A pamphlet written by Alexander Berkman and Emma Goldman shortly before their deportation from the US in 1919. - Summary by Krzysztof Rowiński
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;anarchism; emma goldman; deportation; radicalism; red scare; alexander berkman; ellis island
title: Deportation: Its Meaning and Menace. Last Message to the People of America
